author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: طع عن الدّنیا ویجعل همّه نصرة الأمر في کلّ الأحوال هذا ما قدّر في لوح حفیظ وإذا أراد الخروج من وطنه لأمر ربّه یجعل زاده التّوکّل علی الله ولباسه التّقوی کذلک قدّر من لدی الله العزیز الحمید إذا
translation: Whoso ariseth to teach Our Cause must needs detach himself from all earthly things, and regard, at all times, the triumph of Our Faith as his supreme objective. This hath, verily, been decreed in the Guarded Tablet. And when he determineth to leave his home, for the sake of the Cause of his Lord, let him put his whole trust in God, as the best provision for his journey, and array himself with the robe of virtue. Thus hath it been decreed by God, the Almighty, the All-Praised.
